job_tasks.phrase: Responsible for the research and implementation of core algorithms various AI project including NLP, GenAI, timeseries forecasting and anomaly detection.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to researching and implementing algorithms for AI projects, which is the core of model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in the training and performance optimization of large language models (such as RLHF), analyze and evaluate existing algorithms and data, optimize model generation effects, and reduce harmful, sensitive, or biased responses.
job_tasks.justification: This describes hands-on work with LLMs, including training, optimization, evaluation, and addressing model behavior, which are all modeling tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Research and explore cutting-edge algorithms and frameworks in the direction of RLHF, and continuously improve the efficiency and effect of existing algorithms.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes research and improvement of algorithms, specifically mentioning RLHF, a generative AI technique, aligning with modeling responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Responsible for selecting the best fitting technologies, frameworks and models, designing, implementing and testing the overall solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This encompasses the full software development lifecycle from selection and design to implementation and testing of AI solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: analyze and evaluate existing algorithms and data
job_tasks.justification: While also part of modeling, 'analyze and evaluate existing data' can fall under the data preparation and understanding phase, which is part of data engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: Keep up with the latest technology research and breakthroughs in the field of natural language processing, Deep Learning and knowledge graphs.
Helping each other and honing hands-on skills are core values of the team.
continuous improvement embedded in our sprint rhythm

classification.rationale: The job description strongly emphasizes 'GenAI', 'large language models', and 'RLHF', indicating a focus on generative AI technologies. It also includes core responsibilities like training, fine-tuning, and optimizing LLMs, aligning with the profile's definition.
